title: When you are trying to get people to upgrade their trinkets
body:
http://www.theloop.ca/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/mal5l.gif
250g for the most OP item in the game? No thank you. Warding is the support's job.

replies.body: Thing is, people forget...

Not when I am in the game. I just keep bringing it up until eventually people upgrade their trinkets just to make me shut up. They don't use their trinkets, but they upgrade them. 
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lojrpfFk4T1qbohddo1_250.gif
If only there were more people like you... I myself am guilty of forgetting to upgrade it, but when someone reminds me, I buy it :)

You say you want more people like me, until you realize I went 5/14/6 my last game.But I *did* upgrade my trinket. That has to count for something. But yeah, be careful what you wish for.
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2015-08/19/13/enhanced/webdr05/anigif_original-grid-image-30734-1440007185-13.gif

I never upgrade my trinket.
https://media2.giphy.com/media/yoJC2I6rJYCpVoXUhW/200.gif
*checks you rank* level 18. go figure

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AelPdjq,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-27T14:49:00.475+0000)
>
> You say you want more people like me, until you realize I went 5/14/6 my last game.But I *did* upgrade my trinket. That has to count for something. But yeah, be careful what you wish for.
> http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2015-08/19/13/enhanced/webdr05/anigif_original-grid-image-30734-1440007185-13.gif

Man,i'd rather have a player who have a bad game (it happens) but upgrade its trinket because as you say:this is SO RARE to see.
Seriously it's just so damn good i don't even know why it's so hard for so many players to NOT buy it.It's like they're not disturbed by the lack of vision.

As a support main, if I could have a Staples easy button for LoL it would just say "Hey guys place wards if you have them please!" and I would hit it at least once per game. :) 

{{item:2049}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2043}}
Only once?

> [{quoted}](name=TurquoiseYoshi,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AelPdjq,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2015-10-27T23:34:38.184+0000)
>
> Only once?

**At least** once.
I would be hitting it over and over again like a kid let loose in a Staples. Except I would have a decent reason for it. Because light looks nicer than dark.
I'd spam that button until my finger broke.

Why can't we get an "UPGRADE YOUR TRINKET!" ping or something?
Heck make it a support exclusive, allow the support to sound out all over the rift, "UPGRADE YOUR TRINKET {{champion:18}} !!!"

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sparkle,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AelPdjq,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-10-27T23:24:30.791+0000)
>
> As a support main, if I could have a Staples easy button for LoL it would just say "Hey guys place wards if you have them please!" and I would hit it at least once per game. :) 
> 
> {{item:2049}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2043}}

My leona build: {{item:3158}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3027}}  Damm i dont build {{item:2045}}  I won't lose one of my item slot for that plz just upgrade your trinket.
Warding is everyone's job. It's just that only the support does it.
I say this exact thing and get down votes you say it and get upvotes...
http://www.lovethispic.com/uploaded_images/38324-Keep-Calms-I-m-A-Witch.jpg
{{champion:67}} **BLACK MAGICS!!**
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/497/564/d02.gif
Well everyone needs to get off their lazy butts and start doing their jobs. Aint right they make the sup do it for them.

> [{quoted}](name=VeniVidiVelcro,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AelPdjq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-27T14:43:12.954+0000)
>
> Warding is everyone's job. It's just that only the support does it.

Wait till people can't buy wards in a week or two.
The upgrade icon should start  blinking when it becomes available,  so we never forget
Never forget. . . .
like Yorick?  Sorry had to.

{{champion:67}} *Raises hand*
Yes Vayne?
{{champion:67}} Does upgrading my trinket give me more damage for my 1v5s?
Well, no... but upgrading will-
{{champion:67}} WTF NO DAMAGE HOW CAN I AFFORD TO WASTE MY GOLD ON SOMETHING THAT GIVES ME NO DAMAGE?!?!?!
Sigh... report to room 342 for remedial trinket class

{{champion:67}} "Wards won't give me enough damage to 1v5 Pentakill the enemy team"

{{champion:117}} *Gets caught out, warding*

{{champion:67}} "Noob, stop feeding"

{{champion:67}} *Gets caught out*

{{champion:67}}  "Omfg idiot sup, light this fking map up with wards!"

{{champion:117}} *A Summoner has Disconnected*
Being a support main, this is scarily correct. Minus the ragequit, I just mute them.
there is nothing OP about trinkets your making them out to be more then they are and i don't blame people for ignoring you if you think they are the most op item in the game.
http://24.media.tumblr.com/fcd7ca8ffff08005c706f09b0fd8457b/tumblr_mg6wzo2fgN1ri0p7ro1_500.gif

Every time you get caught out because you don't have vision, remember the free wards you could have been placing. I don't even care if I get a team full of green ward trinkets, as long as my team is using them for vision then there's something.

I don't have that problem because swap to red trinket before i can buy the upgrade and i buy real wards because unlike the shit trinkets they have a decent duration. I get caught in lane knowing i'm going to be camped at the start so any time i die in lane i'm going to be dead regardless if the jungle or another lane shows up due to fucking up in a fight in lane i shouldn't have fought.

> [{quoted}](name=Nunya Bezwacks,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AelPdjq,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2015-10-28T02:26:52.114+0000)
>
> I don't have that problem because swap to red trinket before i can buy the upgrade and i buy real wards because unlike the shit trinkets they have a decent duration. I get caught in lane knowing i'm going to be camped at the start so any time i die in lane i'm going to be dead regardless if the jungle or another lane shows up due to fucking up in a fight in lane i shouldn't have fought.

Unless you're talking about a pink, an upgraded yellow trinket becomes 2 {{item:2044}} so each will last for 3 mins.....
the basic red trinket is better then any form of the yellow trinket by the time it gives actual wards

At the same time not everyone needs to have one. It's good for clearing wards, but generally it's best for the Support and jungler to pick it up for vision denial. Top/mid can get the upgraded Yellow's and Marksman can get Blue or also do the upgraded yellow's.

Also...

> [{quoted}](name=Nunya Bezwacks,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AelPdjq,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2015-10-28T02:26:52.114+0000)
>
> I don't have that problem because swap to red trinket before i can buy the upgrade and i buy real wards because unlike the shit trinkets they have a decent duration.

I'm sure you've been informed, but I'm quite positive 3>3 doesn't make sense. It's 3=3.
I too am sometimes the person pestering everyone. But bronzes don't listen.

I listen.

But when I'm telling others to upgrade trinkets I feel like this.
https://media.giphy.com/media/SyqBIxEnmZaYU/giphy.gif
Ah, I love that movie.
I've loved each lion king movie. I one day hope to be able to sit down and watch them with my kids. Ofcourse I would have to fall in love, get married, and have some kids for that to happen.
I'm considering adoption. Might be a bit difficult as a single parent, though.
It's actually near impossible for a single man to adopt so I'm outa luck there. You should be able to though, as long as you have a decent paying job, and have the time to spend with the child.
I'd need to work towards that for like 7 years, though.
Then your ADC refuses to take any trinket at all, even the free one. Refuses to ward. T_T

Gotta love ADC's. Can't stand them, can't siege without them.

Only reason ADC mains are able to get away with consistently talking shit.
It is common for the masses to lack vision, it's what makes them, well...common.

Lel. I say that always in a game, i had only 2 times, when all team was upgraded this. I think, upgraded version of ward Riot should put in recomended, bcs about 50 % of players didnt know, that this item possible to upgrade.{{item:3361}} {{item:3362}}

I played a game where we were losing and our Mal and Vi were fighting. Not fun. Tabbed and saw Mal had upgraded his trinket and tried the lighten the situation and said "Thanks for upgrading your Trinket, Mal."
{{champion:54}}  LOL THE BRONZE IS STRONG. 250G FOR UNLIMITED WARDS
{{champion:254}} SHUT UP DIP**** YOU'RE BRONZE
It's always my favorite when people insult me for being silver.... in a silver ranked game.

I was playing support on a game and after my carries were constantly being killed in the jungle I told them, "guys upgrade your trinkets so we can stop getting creamed in our own jungle." Their response, "stfu, go play ranked or something."

I'm just sitting there thinking, next time you die in the dark, you'll be all alone.

In the last couple of days somewhere at 30minute mark I type in all-chat the number of basic yellow trinkets. Generally within two minutes only some really special folk are still not upgrading their trinkets. High Plat-Low Dia. =/
